entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
